                 com.rabbitmq.tools.jsonrpc.JsonRpcException
        default constructor of the RPC client.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - the communication problems.
        java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException - broker to long to connect to.
        com.rabbitmq.tools.jsonrpc.JsonRpcException - JSON problem in marshaling or un-marshaling.

        public java.lang.String createGroupAndJoinIt(java.lang.String groupId,
                                             java.lang.String userId)
        calls the createGroupAndJointIt service.
        Parameters:
        groupId - id of the group.
        userId - id of the participant.
        Returns:
        an URL, which is used to connect to the infrastructure for the group communication dedicated to the visit.
